description: Fuuko`s older sister. She used to be an art teacher at Tomoya`s school, and she treats everyone kindly. Kouko is one of the familiar faces in the Furukawa Bakery, and Nagisa admires her very much. Currently she is engaged with Yoshino Yuusuke, and is the major reason why Fuuko still exists in the school, despite still sleeping in the hospital.
name: Ibuki Kouko
